page.title: 07HOTELS IN SW.BOGNOR REGIS
page.content: Many tourists visit our area and there are many{hotels}for them to stay in. There are about{eighteen}hotels and {guest houses}in our area;they can cost between{Â£6}to{Â£26}pounds for bed and breakfast per person for one night.The hotels in our area are busiest in the summer and at Christmas, and offer a wide range of facilities. The{Royal {Norfolk}is a magnificent looking Georgian building.It was built in{1830 though there had been a hotel on that site before this time.It was named after the Duchess of{Norfolk}and has had{Royal}added to its name since {1888.}Many important people have stayed there. The{Carlton Hotel}is the remaining part of{Cotswold Crescent. This{Crescent}was intended to be{600ft long but it collapsed when only four houses had been completed in{1881. The{Royal Hotel}dates from the{1880's.
